response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item comes with a range of features tailored to provide unparalleled performance and convenience. Considering its quality and capabilities, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $7,500. I believe this is a fantastic opportunity for you to experience the benefits of our product at a highly competitive rate. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make this investment in enhancing your experience.", "product_price": 7500}
